sentences.en: As it expands its services around the continent, the competition it offers should force the other airlines to raise their game.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司在整个大陆拓展业务所带来的竞争会迫使其他航空公司有更好的表现。

sentences.en: Ecuador provides a perfect introduction to South America; it's a continent in miniature.
sentences.cn: 厄瓜多尔是认识南美洲的绝佳切入点，它是南美大陆的缩影。

sentences.en: Geographically, the UK is on the periphery of Europe, while Paris is at the heart of the continent.
sentences.cn: 从地理位置上讲，英国处于欧洲边缘，而巴黎却位于欧洲大陆的中心位置。

sentences.en: I've eaten ostrich meat on the continent.
sentences.cn: 我在欧洲大陆时吃过鸵鸟肉。

sentences.en: It ( 指 the rabb it ) overran a whole continent.
sentences.cn: 野兔 蔓延遍了整个大陆.

sentences.en: Its shops are among the most stylish on the Continent.
sentences.cn: 其店铺跻身欧陆最时尚的店铺之列。

sentences.en: More than 491,000 sheep were exported to the Continent for slaughter last year.
sentences.cn: 去年有491,000多只羊被出口到欧洲大陆供宰杀。

sentences.en: Natural disasters have obvi-ously contributed to the continent's economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 很显然，自然灾害也是造成该大陆经济危机的原因之一。

sentences.en: Natural disasters have obviously contributed to the continent's economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 很显然，自然灾害也是造成该大陆经济危机的原因之一。

sentences.en: Starbucks isn't the only thing spreading across the European continent.
sentences.cn: 不光是星巴克咖啡屋遍布欧洲大陆.

sentences.en: The average British school - boy is said to be more intelligent than the majority of his like on the continent.
sentences.cn: 据说英国的一般学童比欧洲大陆的大多数一般学童聪明.

sentences.en: the continents of Asia and Africa
The famine threatened to depopulate the continent.
sentences.cn: 饥荒可能会导致该大洲人口剧减。

sentences.en: The sea divides England and the Continent.
sentences.cn: 大海将英格兰与欧洲大陆分开了.

sentences.en: There are two long rivers within the continent.
We import an incredible amount of cheese from the Continent.
sentences.cn: 我们从欧洲大陆进口数量惊人的奶酪。

words.tran_cn: 自制，克制；节欲（尤指禁欲）

trans.tran_en: able to control your sexual desires
a large mass of land surrounded by sea
